import React, { Component } from 'react' export default class DashboardForm extends Component { constructor(props) { super(props) } handleInputChange = (e) => { this.props.updatePosts(e.target.value) } render() { const { posts, toalPost } = this.props return (
this.search = input} onChange={this.handleInputChange} />
{posts.length > 0 ? posts.map((item) => (
{ this.props.loadDetail(item.subject_id) }}>

{item.subject_name}

{item.description}

{item.class_name}

{item.created_date}
)) :'no syllabus found' }
) } }
